trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to create an event delegate (<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler>) for the event handler (`MyReceiveCompleted`) and associate it with the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个事件委托 (<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler>) 事件处理程序 (`MyReceiveCompleted`) 并将其与关联<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives a message from a queue, and writes its label to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序从队列接收消息，并将其标签写入屏幕。
